description: DartMatrix: Open source darts companion and statistics app
name: dartmatrix

scripts.rebuild-sqlite3: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v44-darwin-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.29.1 --arch=x64 --target_platform=darwin --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v44-darwin-x64
